attributes.title: Horrible app!!
attributes.review: My phone was good and all before I downloaded this app. Once I did and opened it, I started to get weird notifications and pop ups on my phone. They were mainly inappropriate notifications and I was getting fed up from always clicking the exit button from these disturbing notifications. And due to this, I’ve been getting more scam likely phone calls. This is one of the worst apps I’ve ever downloaded!!

attributes.title: NOT WORTH It
attributes.review: This app messed up my phone ,my phone started glitching and saying trump 2020 all over it ,I had to restart it ,it’s a waste of space ✨, as soon as I got it ,it started glitching and kept crashing would not recommend. My pet turtle started to bark at me after I downloaded the app and I’ve never felt so sad in my life 😞. As soon as I deleted it my pet turtle was acting normal again then my pet bunny started flying out of happiness Im so happy about deleting this app ✨.

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review:
This app is the worst thing I’ve ever downloaded it give me a million viruses and took all of my v bucks on fortnite it also have an std and it gave my best friend herpes I am traumatized and need immediate psychological attention pls don’t download the app Oooh nooo It have my bunny stds too oh my what am I to do now pls help this is the worst thing to ever happen to me this app needs to be taken down immediately for the sake of humanity thanks for listening I 
have to go chipotle now Chile anyway so ttyl

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!
attributes.review:
they really did something 🧚🏾‍♂️ 💖🧚🏽✨ now never do it again 

i would rate this app less than one star if i could it is the worst app i've ever used!!! it glitches CONSTANTLY! it takes up tons of storage in your phone, and for no reason because it absolutely DOES NOT WORK!! this app is a literal hate crime against technology and politics!! DO NOT GET!!!! this app alone has made me question what i once thought was an undying support for donald trump, our first ever orange present.

attributes.title: #1 selling fake tan app
attributes.review: Don’t download this app☣️😤I went to go see our president but instead I found a big orange man selling fake tans 🚼🍑🥵 but as soon as I downloaded it my phone turned into my cat so then I bought a flashlight 😘✌🏻then out of know where dishes flew out of my cabinet and I saw the thiccc “president” himself mind controlling my couch to do a backflip ⚠️🤚🏼and he turned my phone into a fish so I went and bought a bed 😤and no regrets have been made since my purchase 🥵🥵💋

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I can’t even describe how much I hated this app. It was a waste of time and phone memory. I will never get the 30 seconds I spent on this app back. It’s going to haunt me for the rest of my life.. what I could’ve done with that time. I am urging anyone that is thinking about this app to reconsider for the sake of your family, mental, and emotional state. I also want to urge the app store to take down this app to prevent others from the horrible fate that I was subjected to.

attributes.title: Pretty sure this app stole my info
attributes.review: I got like a million notifications in the first day, even though I had notifications turned off. My phone kept crashing and coincidence or not, a few days after downloading my credit score dropped 100 points and someone used my social security number to open 5 credit cards.  AND I got a huge zit right in the middle of my forehead. Vote for Biden for clear skin and a perfect credit score.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS SO BAD!!!!! 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: Ok yea I’m talking my family’s phones and writing reviews cuz TIKTOK LIVES MATTER!!!!!!!! Ok dumb reason time!!! So this app killed my fish and made my room dirty! I hate the name to! I just wanted to know more about the cheato that lives in the White House! But this app killed my beloved fish stewy 😭😭😭😭😭 I loved stewy TRUMP (gags) this made my pet Dino sad and he flooded my house when he sobbed. This is a vary bad app and something needs to change! Have a bad day trump and anyone else shall have a great day! Gen Z shall win the fight!!!!!

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: I originally got this app Bc I love the show “Annoying Orange” but it stopped airing on tv so I thought this would be a close second to the show I love so dearly. I soon came to find out that this “annoying orange” is much more annoying the the lovable orange from tv. I soon then deleted the app and cleanse my eyes and soul from what I had whiteness by drinking bleach and pouring it down my face into my eyes. It did not help. My soul was not yet cleansed and I don’t think it ever will be again.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I thought that downloading this app would be an incredible experience as it would allow me to support our lord and savior mr president as he works to get re-elected again this November. As it turns out downloading this app was a HUGE mistake, constant notifications, glitches, and app crashes have made it IMPOSSIBLE to use this app. What’s worse, as soon as the app was installed my phone crashed and took an HOUR to reboot. I was expecting a MUCH higher quality app mr president.
